name: BowBells
0:
”Alexa open Bow Bells”
”Alexa ask Bow Bells for history”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bow bells
des: Recreate the sounds of the bells of St Mary-le-Bow church in your own home. According to tradition a true Cockney must be born within earshot of the sound of Bow Bells.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
